focus: Documenting Symposium 2.0 architecture based on SACP proxy framework

key_understanding.architecture: Symposium is a meta-proxy that internally uses a SACP conductor in proxy mode to orchestrate dynamic component chains
key_understanding.component_pattern: Some features use component/adapter pairs - components enrich capabilities, adapters shim for missing primitives
key_understanding.capability_driven: Conductor examines both upstream (editor) and downstream (agent) capabilities during init to build the right proxy chain
key_understanding.sacp_framework: Using sacp crates (1.0-alpha.2) published on crates.io - sacp, sacp-proxy, sacp-conductor
key_understanding.meta_capabilities: Capabilities stored in _meta.symposium using MetaCapabilityExt trait pattern from sacp crate
